OHIO ASSOCIATES CO v PRITZ PRITZ v OHIO ASSOCIATES CO Decided June 4, 1934 S. Nash, Columbus, and Carl E. Basler, Cincinnati, for Ohio Associates Co. Moulinier, Bettman & Hunt, Cincinnati, and James L. Magrish, Cincinnati, for Pritz. Shook, Davies, Hoover & Beall, Cincinnati, for Standard Mortgage Co. *547For full opinion see 2 OO 177; 194 NE 609; 48 Oh Ap 567.

Ohio Appeals, 1st Dist, Hamilton Co
